name: The Linked Dungeon
description:
The great wizard Omari of the West has accidentally linked himself to his poor brother Ken who must now accompany Omari of the West on his journey through a dangerous dungeon. 

Music credit:

Ethernight Club by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7612-ethernight-club  License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
